name: Rock 'n' Roll (itch) (ingvarb)
description:
The Rock is having trouble: Imbiamba keeps stealing his Academy Awards. In order to keep his property safe, The Rock went with a tried and true method – a rolling rock in a creepy cave. You are the rock. Get ready to roll.

Use space to launch at the beginning of the level, mouse to draw platforms around the boulder.

UT GDA 2020 project.

Made by Anette, Ralf & Ingvar.
